contentrichtext.text: '''MRP''' may refer to: ;Business, economics and management * [[Manufacturing resource planning]] (MRP II) * Marginal revenue product, in the [[marginal revenue productivity theory of wages]] * [[Material requirements planning]] ;Science * [[ATP_Binding_Cassette#Role_in_multidrug_resistance|Multidrug resistant protein]] * [[RNase MRP]], a ribonucleoprotein ;Computers and networking * [[Metro Ring Protocol]], a Layer 2 resilience protocol * [[Multiple Registration Protocol]], a registration protocol used by IEEE 802.1 devices * [[Media Redundancy Protocol]], a data network protocol for Industrial Ethernet ;Other * [[Machine-readable passport]] * [[Middle relief pitcher]], in baseball * [[Rotation formalisms in three dimensions#Rodrigues_parameters|Modified Rodrigues parameters]] * [[Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact]] * Monolithic Rail Platform, a gun part manufactured by [[Lewis Machine and Tool Company]] * [[Moorthorpe railway station]], England (National Rail station code) * ''Mouvement républicain populaire'' ([[Popular Republican Movement]]), a political party in the Fourth French Republic {{disambig}}
